subject: Sailboats and Sailing
America's Cup
lead_paragraph: The America’s Cup holder Alinghi beat its bitter rival BMW Oracle Racing by a second in a tense start to the three-race challenger final at the Pacific Series sailing regatta in Auckland, New Zealand. Meanwhile, lawyers for both teams presented opening arguments to the New York State Court of Appeals in a legal battle over planning for the next America’s Cup.
